question: Which city recently organized the 50th Conference of Governors?
explanation: The 50th annual Conference of Governors began with an inaugural session at the Rashtrapati Bhawan in New Delhi. Seventeen first time Governors and Lt. Governors of the newly formed union territories of Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh participated in the Conference. The 50th edition of the Conference was to evaluate the achievements and outcomes of the past Conferences. The Governor has a unique role to play in realizing a cooperative and competitive federal structure.
